{{Cquote|{{Toggle|button=<center>'''<big><big>{{color|blue|{{lj|Time decides who you meet in life,your heart decides who you want in your life,and your behavior decides who stays in your life.}}}}'''</big></big></center>
|content=----
<center><big><big>时间决定你会在生命中遇见谁，你的心决定你想要谁出现在你的生命里，而你的行为决定最后谁能留下。</big></big></center>}}|梭罗《瓦尔登湖》}}
